hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT MAX(baa.AuditOperationDate) AS AuditOperationDate FROM BillingAccount_Audit baa

SELECT {bi.*} From BillingItem bi JOIN MasterBillingItem mbi ON mbi.idMasterBillingItem = bi.idMasterBillingItem JOIN BillingTemplate bt ON bt.idBillingTemplate = mbi.idBillingTemplate WHERE bt.targetClassName LIKE '%Request%' AND bt.targetClassIdentifier = :idRequest

SELECT {bi.*} From BillingItem bi JOIN MasterBillingItem mbi ON mbi.idMasterBillingItem = bi.idMasterBillingItem JOIN BillingTemplate bt ON bt.idBillingTemplate = mbi.idBillingTemplate WHERE bt.targetClassName LIKE '%ProductOrder%' AND bt.targetClassIdentifier = :idProductOrder
